idea: ALLIED GLOBAL LLP  Merchant Traders (Exports / Imports / Inter-trade) with a focus of North Sudan since a Hundred years & 3 generations. Born & raised Sudan, the Founder Shri Dilip Shoh started as Allied Traders in Khartoum between 1970-1989, as an Importer Merchant of various consumer & industrial products, raw materials for local factories & commodities from nearby countries & across the world, but majorly from India & China. by assisting and heading procurement from Indian manufacturers as their Buying / Indenting Agent for various Manufacturers spread across Industries like Food, Confectionery & Plastic. Right from Turnkey Projects to Packing Materials to Human Capital were sourced & supplied successfully.
name: ALLIED GLOBAL LLP

idea: Jewellerskart.com was started out of our passion for jewellery and E-commerce. Our focus - to provide distinctive products & a variety of digital e-commerce solutions. We aim to enable more people to be able to start their own jewellery business. We provide our jeweller clients with a professional and customized e-commerce website, where they can publish our products & theirs.
name: MANI WEB SOLUTIONS PRIVATE LIMITED

idea:
AbacusDotAI India Pvt. Ltd. is the subsidiary company of Abacus.AI Inc, USA. Abacus.AI Inc is building a cloud AI platform that handles all aspects of machine and deep learning at enterprise scale. The solution offers customisable end-to-end autonomous AI services for many business use cases such as time-series forecasting, deep-learning based personalisation, churn prediction, etc.

Abacus.AI is planning to invest $50 million in its R&D (research and development) division incorporated in AbacusDotAI India Pvt. Ltd. over the next three years. AbacusDotAI India Pvt. Ltd. plans to initially hire 20 engineers and scientists, and this number is planned to be increased to 200 in the next three years. Located in Mumbai, the R&D division will cater to the AI (artificial intelligence) adoption by small and large firms. Establishing a division within India is critical as it becomes an integral asset of rapidly growing businesses and a talent hub for engineers who are passionate about AI. The company is providing customers and companies with the flexibility and opportunity for businesses to expand their AI infrastructure.
name: ABACUSDOTAI INDIA PVT. LTD

name: Ayush Asawa

idea:
Weâ€™re a business made up of innovators and forward-thinkers, with the drive and wherewithal to constantly update and improve products that offer utmost scope of surgical and medical training to both current and aspiring medical professionals. We are focused on developing new products and materials that mimic the human systems as closely as possible to give our end-users a real-life-like experience when using our products for learning and training various medical and surgical procedures. Our innovation for new products is customer-driven and focused to upskill the healthcare workers across India. We aim to understand the loopholes in the current healthcare system and provide them a system driven approach by creating an extensive medical simulation models that provides a complete user experience at an affordable cost to resolve those areas.

Our goal is to scale and make our products available across India. Once we achieve this, our goal is to expand into the global market. Customer-driven innovation is at the core of our entire product development process.

Our products resulting from our innovation will change the way medical students and other healthcare workers train to become more competent in their skills.
name: SIMUTOMY MEDTECH PRIVATE LIMITED

idea: Rooftop is an all inclusive online learning platform and an exclusive creative community! It is India's leading online learning platform for live art workshops and professionally curated art courses.
name: Rooftop
